subject: Basketball
Football
lead_paragraph: Despite declaring for the N.B.A. draft and not having played football in four years, the L.S.U basketball player Glen Davis could be a late-round pick in the N.F.L. draft.
snippet: Despite declaring for the N.B.A. draft and not having played football in four years, the L.S.U basketball player Glen Davis could be a late-round pick in the N.F.L. draft.
